name: Locathah
description: Locathah are aquatic humanoids with fish-like features. They live in underwater communities, where they are skilled hunters, gatherers, and artisans. Locathah are resilient and strong, with a deep connection to the ocean and its creatures. They are known for their discipline, resourcefulness, and dedication to their clans.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.
special: Leviathan Will: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.
